channel.title: BBC Sport
channel.link: The latest BBC news, results and calendars for American football, baseball, basketball, bowls, darts, ice hockey, netball, squash, and winter sports.
channel.copyright: Copyright: (C) British Broadcasting Corporation, see http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport1/hi/help/rss/4517815.stm for terms and conditions of reuse

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: Nicky Hunt expects to challenge for a medal at Rio 2016 after learning she will receive full Olympic funding from Archery GB.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: Baltimore beat Indianapolis, Houston see off Cincinnati, Green Bay too good for Minnesota and Seattle win in Washington.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: Chris Adcock to renew badminton mixed doubles partnership with fiancee Gabby White.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: San Francisco Giants clinch their second World Series title in three years, sweeping Detroit Tigers 4-0.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: Carmelo Anthony inspired New York Knicks to a comfortable 102-87 win over Detroit Pistons at a sold-out O2 Arena.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: Devon's England bowler Natalie Melmore says she is happy with her bronze medal at the World Championships in Australia.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: Campbell Walsh, K1 silver medallist at the Athens Olympic Games, announces his retirement from canoeing.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: Phil Taylor apologises to Raymond van Barneveld after an altercation at the end of their PDC darts semi-final.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: Tom Daley's success lures some of the UK's most promising young divers to relocate to his Plymouth training base.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: Showjumper Tim Stockdale is setting his sights on competing at the Rio Olympic Games of 2016 at the age of 52.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: Scottish fencer Keith Cook is to take legal action over his omission from Great Britain's Olympic squad.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: Fourteen-man Westmeath earn a shock 0-14 to 0-12 win over Antrim in the Leinster Hurling Championship clash at Mullingar.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: Olympic gymnast Beth Tweddle is given an honorary fellowship from the university where she studied.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: The funding of British Olympians makes it impossible for emerging sports to develop, says the chief executive of British Handball.

item.title: BBC Sport
item.description: England's hockey squad is going "in at the deep end" at the Champions Trophy in Australia, says coach Jason Lee
